# Boltic SMS

The **Boltic SMS connector** enables your workflows to send text messages seamlessly to any recipient across the globe. This guide will help you set up the Boltic SMS connector and start performing the SMS operation.

### Overview

Before using the Boltic SMS connector, review the brief setup guidance below.

## **Basic Operations**

Here is the basic operation you can perform with the Boltic SMS connector:

### Message

- **Send Message**: Send a plain-text SMS message to a single recipient using a supported SMS gateway provider.

## **Conclusion**

The Boltic SMS connector is a simple yet powerful tool for integrating SMS capabilities into your workflows. With a no-code setup and a single drag-and-drop operation, you can quickly enable SMS delivery for transactional alerts, notifications, or promotional messages.

ai_description.integration: Use this activity to send SMS messages via the Boltic SMS cloud platform when your workflow needs to deliver OTPs, alerts, or reminders, utilizing the send_message operation for real-time communication.
